title: 1.5 Master Challenge 1
question: Write a pseudocode, asking the user to input their age. Check if they are eligible to vote in a national election for which the minimum age attained must be 18 years. Use boolean expressions and print the result.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
